title: BlackLock Ransomware Exposed After Researchers Exploit Leak Site Vulnerability
description: In what's an instance of hacking the hackers, threat hunters have managed to infiltrate the online infrastructure associated with a ransomware group called BlackLock, uncovering crucial information about their modus operandi in the process.  Resecurity said it identified a security vulnerability in the data leak site (DLS) operated by the e-crime group that made it possible to extract
